hero.description: Full Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience. Expert in Svelte, Vue.js, TypeScript, CSS3 and Redux, with practical experience in .NET 6 MVC, Entity Framework, LINQ and REST APIs. Proficient in Node.js with Express, working with SQL Server, MongoDB and PostgreSQL, and creating effective AI prompts that optimize workflows.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Full Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience. Specialist in Front-End (Svelte, Vue.js, TypeScript, CSS3, Redux) and hands-on Back-End work with .NET 6 MVC, Entity Framework, LINQ, async programming, dependency injection and REST APIs. Proficient in Node.js with Express, familiar with Nest.js and experienced with SQL Server, MongoDB and PostgreSQL. Also a Prompt Engineer who optimizes workflows through AI.

goals.shortTerm: Short Term: Establish myself as a Full Stack Developer focused on AI and automation, leveraging Prompt Engineering and automated workflows to deliver greater value to companies.
goals.longTerm: Long Term: Become a technology leader specialized in microservices, scalable systems and the adoption of AI in enterprise environments, working on high-impact international projects.
goals.title: Professional Goals

item1.description: Sole Front-End responsible for the SICOJ system's Consultations module at SAT. Developed with Svelte, TypeScript and Redux, recognized for delivering the project's most advanced module.

item2.description: Contribution to both Front-End and Back-End as a bridge between external APIs and the frontend. Worked with .NET 6 MVC, Entity Framework, LINQ, async programming, dependency injection and HTTP response handling, integrating APIs from an external central control.

item3.description: .NET 6 MVC view design with jQuery and Bootstrap. Created WordPress sites and managed version control in GitHub under Scrum methodology.

item4.company: Tecnológico de Estudios Superiores de Ecatepec
item4.description: Graduated with professional license. Strong background in software development, databases and development methodologies.
